CustomField.description: US-0009350 - [Ads 2020] EU Floor Price/Ad Type/Priority Requirements
CustomField.formula:
CASE( Billing_Category__c,
"Fix Price","SPONSORSHIP",
"CPO","PRICE_PRIORITY",
"CPC","PRICE_PRIORITY",
"CPM",
CASE( Rebate_In_Kind_Reason__c, "on top service","PRICE_PRIORITY", "Compensation","STANDARD", IF(Below_Floor__c,"BULK","STANDARD")),
"STANDARD" )
CustomField.label: Ad Type
